text: Riccarda Mazzotta (born 8 June 1986) is a Swiss professional racing cyclist. She rides for the Servetto Footon team. ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Riccarda Mazzotta
